entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is being addressed by Magorian. He is accompanied by students from the school.

entities.name: magorian
entities.description: Magorian is a centaur who is in charge of the group. He is calm and smooth-talking.

entities.name: bane
entities.description: Bane is a contemptuous centaur who interrupts Magorian.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is a person who has been called a traitor by Bane. He was helped to escape by Hagrid.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student from the school who is trying to calm down Hagrid.

relationships.description: Hagrid threatens Magorian with his crossbow.
